contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement| settlement_type = Town | subdivision_type = Country | official_name = Yasynuvata| native_name = Ясинувата| subdivision_name = Ukraine| image_seal = Yasynyv t.gif| subdivision_type1 = Oblast| subdivision_name1 = [[Donetsk Oblast|Donetsk]]| population_total = 37600| population_as_of = 2001| area_total_km2 = 19| established_date = 1872| established_title = Founded| elevation_m = | latd = | latm = | latNS = | longd = | longm = | longEW = | website = http://yasinovataya.org.ua/| image_map = }} '''Yasynuvata''' ({{lang-uk|Ясинувата}}; {{lang-ru|Ясиноватая}}; [[Romanization of Ukrainian|tranlit.]] ''Yasynuvata'') is a city in [[Donetsk Oblast]] ([[Oblast|province]]) of south-eastern [[Ukraine]], and the [[Capital city|administrative center]] of the [[Yasynuvata Raion]]. It is located 21 km from [[Donetsk]], the administrative center of the Donetsk Oblast. As of 2004, the city's population is 37,000. Yasynuvata is a large railway crossroad. It was founded in 1872. ==External links== * [http://yasinovataya.org.ua/ Yasynuvata city administration website] * [http://ya.dn.ua/ Yasynuvata city portal] {{Donetsk Oblast}} [[Category:Cities in Donetsk Oblast]] {{Donetsk-geo-stub}}
